alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 10:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Weber... southeastern Box Elder...Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1056 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 14 miles southeast of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 30 miles southwest of Brigham City, moving east southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. Best chance of hail between Willard and North Ogden. SOURCE...Radar indicated and surface observation confirmed. The Marsh mesonet site on the Great Salt Lake Causeway recorded a wind gust to 53 mph at 1043 PM MDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Brigham City, Tremonton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Perry, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville and Uintah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 329 and 380. Interstate 84 between mile markers 40 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
